video_prompt: A bell pepper slices open, revealing a miniature room within. Inside, animated plants subtly sway. Tiny light sources flicker. A fluid drip slowly descends from the pepper's interior roof. The pepper gently floats, shifting against an off-white background.
image_prompt: A sliced green bell pepper, levitating against an off-white background, reveals a miniature, fully furnished, brightly lit room inside. The cozy room features a bed, coffee table with flowers, sofa, golden lamp, and numerous lush green plants. A large arched window shows more greenery outside. Abstract artworks, a mirror, and wooden shelves adorn the light-colored walls. Hardwood flooring, with a small drip of liquid from the pepper's interior. Text "c29" in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: A bell pepper splits open, dynamically revealing an intricate interior. Inside, miniature foliage fluidly sways. Illumination rapidly flickers. A liquid drop slowly detaches and falls from above. The pepper continuously rotates and shifts its position.
